title: Socialisation: Primary Socialisation at Home üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüëß - A Level Sociology Learning & Revision
description:
This week, Emma looks at the primary socialisation that occurs at home for your A level Sociology exam. She goes through the attitudes towards primary socialisation of functionalists, Marxists and feminists. Perfect for the AQA exam board. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam.

Click here for the full course, or visit this link: http://bit.ly/30id5tm
